Module kivakit.core.collections
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.collections.primitive.array.bits.io

Interface BitWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseBitWriter, BitOutput
    public interface BitWriter
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Interface for code that writes bits to some destination.

    Implementers must provide:

    • cursor() - The current write position in bits
    • flush() - Flushes any unwritten data
    • writeBit(boolean) - Writes the given bit to output
    • onClose() - Closes the writer, flushing any data

    Default methods provide:

    • write(long, int)
    • writeByte(byte)
    • writeInt(int)
    • writeString(String)
    • writeFlexibleInt(int, int, int)
